message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Can you consider this price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I'm not willing to go down to $100, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $115. This is my final compromise, so please let me know if it's acceptable to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I'm not willing to go down to $105. I can offer it to you for $110, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're interested, this is your last chance.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable going above $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $107.50?
I'm not willing to meet you at $107.50, but I'm willing to make one last concession. I can offer it to you for $108. This is my absolute final offer, so please let me know if it's acceptable to you.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable going above $105. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I think I'll go ahead and buy the product from John for $120.
